decks.notes: The main concept of this Mardu Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures like Ocelot Pride and Guide of Souls, while also using disruptive spells like Cabal Therapy and Thoughtseize to control the board. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah can be a finisher by turning all creatures into powerful threats. The deck also utilizes efficient removal like Swords to Plowshares and Wasteland to keep the opponent on the back foot. Overall, the strategy revolves around quickly building a strong board presence and disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure a victory.

This deck aims to overwhelm opponents with a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells, focusing on controlling the tempo of the game. By using cards like Thoughtseize, Daze, and Force of Will to disrupt opponents' plans, while deploying threats like Orcish Bowmasters, Barrowgoyf, and Murktide Regent, the deck seeks to pressure opponents into making costly mistakes and seizing victory. With a mix of efficient removal and card draw, this aggro Dimir Tempo deck aims to dictate the pace of the game and come out on top.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and board wipes while also ramping up mana with cards like Utopia Sprawl and Abundant Growth. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad allows for extra value by blinking permanents for additional effects. The deck also includes powerful threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Solitude for added versatility. Overall, the deck aims to outmaneuver opponents by efficiently managing resources and controlling the board state to secure victory.

This deck focuses on utilizing aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and pressure the opponent. The inclusion of the companion Yorion, Sky Nomad allows for additional value and flexibility in long games. By combining a suite of efficient removal spells like Solitude and Swords to Plowshares with disruptive creatures like Skyclave Apparition and Recruiter of the Guard, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while deploying threats of its own. Additionally, the deck's mana base is carefully constructed to support its aggressive game plan with a mix of lands that provide colored mana and utility effects.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures while disrupting their game plan with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The deck aims to ramp quickly into powerful threats such as Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer, while also utilizing cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Wastescape Battlemage to control the board. The inclusion of cards like Eldrazi Temple, Eye of Ugin, and City of Traitors allows for efficient mana production to deploy threats ahead of curve. Overall, the deck is designed to apply pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy.

This deck aims to quickly fill the graveyard with creatures and spells, allowing for a game-winning combo using Dread Return and either Thassa's Oracle or Undercity Informer to win the game on the spot. It utilizes a mix of fast mana acceleration, disruption for the opponent, and graveyard recursion to achieve its combo efficiently. The goal is to combo off as quickly as possible while protecting the key pieces and disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure a victory in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The deck focuses on controlling the opponent's threats while efficiently utilizing powerful Stoneblade cards such as Swords to Plowshares and Stoneforge Mystic. It aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan with counterspells like Daze and Force of Will, while also generating card advantage with cards like Brainstorm and Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student. The inclusion of powerful threats like Murktide Regent and Batterskull allows the deck to close out the game quickly once it has established control. Additionally, the mana base includes disruptive lands like Wasteland and Karakas to further disrupt the opponent's strategy.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and disruptive enchantments. By utilizing cards like Swords to Plowshares, Force of Will, and Back to Basics, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan while simultaneously advancing its own through card advantage and card selection with Brainstorm and Ponder. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Jace, the Mind Sculptor allow for card advantage and manipulation, while Murktide Regent and Snapcaster Mage provide threats to close out the game. The deck aims to maintain control of the game until it can secure a win condition.

This Legacy deck focuses on utilizing artifact creatures and spells to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays. By combining powerful artifacts like Lotus Petal, Mox Opal, and Mishra's Bauble with creatures like Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Kappa Cannoneer, the deck aims to control the board and deal damage efficiently. Additionally, cards like Chalice of the Void and Urza's Saga provide disruption and additional win conditions. The deck is designed to be fast-paced and relentless in its pursuit of victory through artifact synergy and aggression.

The deck focuses on using a combination of aggressive creatures and disruptive spells to control the board and disrupt the opponent's game plan. It utilizes the Death & Taxes archetype to pressure the opponent's resources and keep them off balance. Cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Aether Vial help to streamline the deck's strategy, while creatures like Skyclave Apparition and Solitude provide powerful removal options. The deck also includes a companion in Yorion, Sky Nomad for additional value and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's plans.

The main focus of this deck is to assemble the Mystic Forge combo utilizing artifacts like The One Ring, Glaring Fleshraker, and Planar Nexus. Tezzeret, Karn, and Mystic Forge help provide additional card advantage and synergy, while cards like Manifold Key and Voltaic Key help ensure the combo can go off smoothly. The deck utilizes Urza lands for mana acceleration and powerful artifacts like Candelabra of Tawnos and Grim Monolith to generate mana. The goal is to assemble the combo quickly and overwhelm the opponent with powerful artifact creatures and abilities.

The main concept of this deck is to establish an aggressive board presence early in the game by utilizing fast mana sources like Chrome Mox and Lotus Petal to cast disruptive creatures like Chancellor of the Annex and Thalia, Heretic Cathar. The inclusion of cards like Trinisphere and Bloodboil Sorcerer further disrupts the opponent's game plan while cards like Caves of Chaos Adventurer and Seasoned Dungeoneer provide card advantage and resilience. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent and control the pace of the game with a mix of disruptive creatures and efficient mana sources.

This Legacy Death & Taxes deck focuses on efficient creatures and disruptive spells to control the game and pressure the opponent. The deck utilizes cards like Stoneforge Mystic and Skyclave Apparition to disrupt the opponent's game plan, while also using Aether Vial to cheat creatures into play and outvalue the opponent. The deck also includes powerful removal in Swords to Plowshares and Solitude to deal with threats. The addition of Yorion, Sky Nomad as a companion provides additional value and card advantage in longer games.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast and aggressive playstyle using artifacts and blue cards. Emry, Lurker of the Loch and Urza's Bauble are key cards in the deck, enabling card advantage and recurring artifacts from the graveyard. Mox Opal and Lotus Petal provide ramp for quick plays, while Force of Will offers protection against opposing threats. The deck also features powerful artifacts like Pithing Needle and Urza's Saga to control the battlefield and maintain pressure. Overall, the deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent with efficient artifact-based aggression.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan with aggressive creatures and disruptive spells. By utilizing mana acceleration cards like Lotus Petal and Simian Spirit Guide, the deck aims to deploy threats like Chancellor of the Annex and Anointed Peacekeeper early on. Additionally, the inclusion of City of Traitors and Cavern of Souls allows for efficient mana fixing and casting of spells. This Aggro - Initiative Stompy deck seeks to overwhelm the opponent with powerful creatures and disruptive elements to secure victory.

The deck focuses on quickly ramping up mana with cards like Lotus Petal and Eldrazi Temple to play powerful Eldrazi creatures such as Thought-Knot Seer and Reality Smasher ahead of schedule. It also disrupts opponents' strategies with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive Eldrazi creatures and disrupt their game plan, ultimately securing victory through a combination of speed, power, and disruption.
